en.subject: ğŸ” Your Account Permissions Have Been Updated

body.intro: Your account permissions in Purra have been updated.

impact.title: What This Means
impact.description: Your new role may give you access to additional features or restrict certain capabilities. Log in to see your updated dashboard and available actions.

support.title: Questions?
support.description: If you have questions about your new permissions or believe this change was made in error, please contact your administrator or our support team.

body.footer: Your account security is our priority.
